content: अधिविन्ना [विद्-क्त] A superseded wife, one whose husband has married again; according to Hindu Śāstras a wife may be superseded for any one of these {8} defects: --सुरापी व्याधिता धूर्ता वंध्यार्थध्न्यप्रियंवदा . स्त्रीप्रसूश्चाधिवेत्तव्या पुरुषद्वेषिणी तथा <ls>Y. 1. 73</ls>, <ls n="Y. 1.">74</ls>; <ls>Ms. 9. 80-83</ls>.
